ROM.Changelog: ### Changelog 20160227 * MaxiKernel updated to 3.4.70 * Introduced Intelliplug 3.7 on MaxiKernel * Introduced Powersuspend on MaxiKernel * Change values on MaxiKernel for reduce some lags * Make more faster Wakelock * Reduced zRAM size * Tweak some governors * Introduced some tweaks on MaxiKernel * Reclaimed some RAM * Little Pink Tweaks * INTRODUCED SUPPORT FOR OPTIMIZATIONS ON msm8226-common (Based in CyanogenMod 12.0 Optimized by MasterAwesome) * Little memory tweaks * Changed init.qcom.rc "interactive" governor for "performance" (50% more performance) * And More
